title: Temple Amun Re-ritual and meaning of axial plan

content.prompt: The progression of distinct spaces along the axial plan of the temple of Amun-Re at Karnak reflects the

choices.label: increasing restriction of access as one moved toward the inner sanctum
separation of spaces according to their mortuary, religious, and secular functions
beliefs about the different stages a soul must pass through to reach the afterlife
stages of enlightenment that a worshipper would experience during prayer

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
